verses.verse: Sing <WH7442>, O barren<WH6135>, thou that didst not bear<WH3205>; break forth<WH6476> into singing<WH7440>, and cry aloud<WH6670>, thou that didst not travail with child<WH2342>: for more<WH7227> are the children<WH1121> of the desolate<WH8074> than the children<WH1121> of the married wife<WH1166>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>.

Enlarge <WH7337> the place<WH4725> of thy tent<WH168>, and let them stretch forth<WH5186> the curtains<WH3407> of thy habitations<WH4908>; spare<WH2820> not<WH748>: lengthen thy cords<WH4340>, and strengthen<WH2388> thy stakes<WH3489>.

For thou shalt spread abroad<WH6555> on the right hand<WH3225> and on the left<WH8040>; and thy seed<WH2233> shall possess<WH3423> the nations<WH1471>, and make the desolate<WH8074> cities<WH5892> to be inhabited<WH3427>.

Fear <WH3372> not<WH954>; for thou shalt not be ashamed: neither be thou confounded<WH3637>; for thou shalt not be put to shame<WH2659>: for thou shalt forget<WH7911> the shame<WH1322> of thy youth<WH5934>; and the reproach<WH2781> of thy widowhood<WH491> shalt thou remember no more<WH2142>.

For thy Maker<WH6213> is thy husband<WH1166>; Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> is his name<WH8034>: and the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478> is thy Redeemer<WH1350>; the God<WH430> of the whole earth<WH776> shall he be called<WH7121>.

For Jehovah<WH3068> hath called<WH7121> thee as a wife<WH802> forsaken<WH5800> and grieved<WH6087> in spirit<WH7307>, even a wife<WH802> of youth<WH5271>, when she is cast off<WH3988>, saith<WH559> thy God<WH430>.
For a small<WH6996> moment<WH7281> have I forsaken<WH5800> thee<WH1419>; but with great mercies<WH7356> will I gather thee<WH6908>.

In overflowing<WH8241> wrath<WH7110> I hid<WH5641> my face<WH6440> from thee for a moment<WH7281>; but with everlasting<WH5769> lovingkindness<WH2617> will I have mercy<WH7355> on thee<WH559>, saith Jehovah<WH3068> thy Redeemer<WH1350>.

For this is as the waters<WH4325> of Noah<WH5146> unto me<WH7650>; for as I have sworn that the waters<WH4325> of Noah<WH5146> shall no more go over<WH5674> the earth<WH776>, so have I sworn<WH7650> that I will not be wroth<WH7107> with thee<WH1605>, nor rebuke thee.

For the mountains<WH2022> may depart<WH4185>, and the hills<WH1389> be removed<WH4131>; but my lovingkindness<WH2617> shall not depart<WH4185> from thee<WH1285>, neither shall my covenant of peace<WH7965> be removed<WH4131>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> that hath mercy on thee<WH7355>.

O thou afflicted<WH6041>, tossed with tempest<WH5590>, and not comforted<WH5162>, behold<WH7257>, I will set thy stones<WH68> in fair colors<WH6320>, and lay thy foundations<WH3245> with sapphires<WH5601>.
And I will make<WH7760> thy pinnacles<WH8121> of rubies<WH3539>, and thy gates<WH8179> of carbuncles<WH68>, and all thy border<WH1366> of precious<WH2656> stones<WH68>.
And all thy children<WH1121> shall be taught<WH3928> of Jehovah<WH3068>; and great<WH7227> shall be the peace<WH7965> of thy children<WH1121>.

In righteousness<WH6666> shalt thou be established<WH3559>: thou shalt be far<WH7368> from oppression<WH6233>, for thou shalt not fear<WH3372>; and from terror<WH4288>, for it shall not come near thee<WH7126>.
Behold <WH1481>, they may gather together<WH1481>, but not<WH657> by me<WH4310>: whosoever shall gather together<WH1481> against thee shall fall because of thee<WH5307>.

Behold <WH1254>, I have created the smith<WH2796> that bloweth<WH5301> the fire<WH784> of coals<WH6352>, and bringeth forth<WH3318> a weapon<WH3627> for his work<WH4639>; and I have created<WH1254> the waster<WH7843> to destroy<WH2254>.

No weapon<WH3627> that is formed<WH3335> against thee shall prosper<WH6743>; and every tongue<WH3956> that shall rise<WH6965> against thee in judgment<WH4941> thou shalt condemn<WH7561>. This is the heritage<WH5159> of the servants<WH5650> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and their righteousness<WH6666> which is of me<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>.
